item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Black Bear Saloon

Drink specials are:

$2 "you call it" from 6pm til 9pm (any drink that's normally $6 or less is $2 for those three hours). this includes:

-Draft Beers
-Call Drinks
-House wine
-Soda and Juice

Does not include:

-Shots
-Red Bull
-Martinis
-Tall Drinks and Doubles

please note that you must see me (Ben) for a wristband in order to get the special price.

Your contact for this event is Ben: (203) 554-5144

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome?
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
